channel.title: Selenium on Hi, I'm Kyle
channel.description: Recent content in Selenium on Hi, I'm Kyle

item.title: Part 2: My Future Self is Beating the Dad-Bod
item.description: Every day right at 4pm when I should just about be getting hungry for dinner and losing motivation, I get a text message from My Future Self. The text message reminds me of my weight for today and compares it against all of the other 1048 entries I’ve logged on my scale the last decade. **My Future Self **is smart enough to compare my weight to the previous day to give some encouragement or tough love.
